stem: A patient receiving ipratropium complains of dry mouth and blurred vision after treatment. What is the most likely cause?

stem: A chronic CO2 retainer with COPD receives high FiO2 and develops rising PaCO2. Which mechanism most contributes to this increase?
option_a: Worsening VQ mismatch from loss of hypoxic vasoconstriction
option_b: Complete loss of respiratory drive only
rationale_correct: High oxygen can worsen VQ mismatch by reversing hypoxic pulmonary vasoconstriction, increasing dead space ventilation.
